original_text: And he took ten men of the elders of the city, and said, Sit ye down here. And they sat down.
korean_text: 보아스가 그 성읍 장로 열 명을 청하여 이르되 당신들은 여기 앉으라 하니 그들이 앉으매

sentences.original_text: And he took ten men of the elders of the city,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 성 장로 열 사람을 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: and said, Sit ye down here.
